thread.title: Cocaine with Lionel Messi branding seized by Peruvian police
thread.title_full: Cocaine with Lionel Messi branding seized by Peruvian police

title: Cocaine with Lionel Messi branding seized by Peruvian police
text:
0 24-Mar-2017 01:06:48 The South American authorities have confirmed that more than $91 million worth of cocaine was confiscated after they found it in squid fillets 
Peruvian police announced they seized 1,417 kilos of cocaine on Wednesday that was packaged with images of Barcelona star Lionel Messi. 
Not only was Messi's face plastered all over the packaging, but his name, the Barcelona logo and the seal of the King of Spain was also depicted, Peruvian officials said in a news release. 
The seized cocaine reportedly has a street value of $85 million. 
However, that's not the strangest part. The cocaine was found stuffed in nearly 1,300 squid fillets that were being prepped to be shipped to Belgium. Se incauto una tonelada y media de cocaína en el puerto del Callao. https://t.co/Iou5PZPHQi pic.twitter.com/vGxQauEyx9 — Policía Peruana (@PoliciaPeru) March 21, 2017 
No one has been arrested for the shipment yet. Related
